author: Ariel @redtachyon
text:
What you need to understand about companies hiring remotely is that there are two very distinct categories.

Category 1 pays slightly under market because people love remote positions, so any job posting will get a ton of attention - demand outpaces supply.

Category 2 pays way above market because they want the best people they can find, wherever they might be in the world.

Fortunately, these two categories tend to be easy to tell apart.
